trans-unit.source: Provides the services for management of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 提供管理 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> 物件的服務。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> provides methods that you can use to manage the workflow queues associated with a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> 提供的方法，可以讓您用於管理與工作流程執行個體關聯的工作流程佇列。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a method, named `CreateQueue`, that initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> object by calling the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.GetService%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範名為 `CreateQueue` 的方法，此方法透過呼叫 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> 方法來初始化 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.GetService%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The code then uses the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.Exists%2A> method to determine if a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> with a specified name exists.
trans-unit.target: 然後，此程式碼會使用 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.Exists%2A> 方法來判斷具有指定名稱的 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> 是否存在。

trans-unit.source: If it does not exist, the code calls the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.CreateWorkflowQueue%2A> method; if it does the code calls the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.GetWorkflowQueue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果不存在，程式碼會呼叫 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.CreateWorkflowQueue%2A> 方法，否則呼叫 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.GetWorkflowQueue%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the File Watcher Activity SDK Sample from the FileSystemEvent.cs file.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是 FileSystemEvent.cs 檔案中＜檔案監看員活動 SDK＞範例的一部分。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [File System Watcher Activity](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5442b63a-bdad-43d0-b7cf-f0b5d8b56a99).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[檔案系統監看員活動](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5442b63a-bdad-43d0-b7cf-f0b5d8b56a99)。

trans-unit.source: The name of the queue.
trans-unit.target: 佇列的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> is visible outside the scope of the current transaction.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> 在目前交易範圍外是否可見的值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> by using the specified name and transactional scope.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的名稱和交易範圍建立 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> is created with the specified `queueName`.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> 建立 `queueName`。

trans-unit.source: If transactional is `true`, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> is only visible inside the current transaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果可交易為 `true`，只有在目前交易內才可以看見 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a method, named `CreateQueue`, that initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> object by calling the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.GetService%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範名為 `CreateQueue` 的方法，此方法透過呼叫 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> 方法來初始化 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.GetService%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The code then uses the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.Exists%2A> method to determine if a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> with a specified name exists.
trans-unit.target: 然後，此程式碼會使用 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.Exists%2A> 方法來判斷具有指定名稱的 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> 是否存在。

trans-unit.source: If it does not exist, the code calls the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.CreateWorkflowQueue%2A> method; if it does the code calls the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.GetWorkflowQueue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果不存在，程式碼會呼叫 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.CreateWorkflowQueue%2A> 方法，否則呼叫 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.GetWorkflowQueue%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the File Watcher Activity SDK Sample from the FileSystemEvent.cs file.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是 FileSystemEvent.cs 檔案中＜檔案監看員活動 SDK＞範例的一部分。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [File System Watcher Activity](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5442b63a-bdad-43d0-b7cf-f0b5d8b56a99).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[檔案系統監看員活動](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5442b63a-bdad-43d0-b7cf-f0b5d8b56a99)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="queueName" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="queueName" /> 為 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> with the name specified by <paramref name="queueName" /> already exists.
trans-unit.target: 具有 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> 指定之名稱的 <paramref name="queueName" /> 已經存在。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> to delete.
trans-unit.target: 要刪除之 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Deletes the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: 刪除指定的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a method that writes a string to the console, creates an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> by calling the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.GetService%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範將字串寫入主控台的方法，透過呼叫 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> 方法建立 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.GetService%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the code calls the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.DeleteWorkflowQueue%2A> method to delete the queue associated with a `QueueName` property on the current workflow.
trans-unit.target: 最後，程式碼會呼叫 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.DeleteWorkflowQueue%2A> 方法，以刪除目前工作流程上與 `QueueName` 屬性關聯的佇列。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the File Watcher Activity SDK Sample from the FileSystemEvent.cs file.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是 FileSystemEvent.cs 檔案中＜檔案監看員活動 SDK＞範例的一部分。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="queueName" /> 為 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Tests for the existence of the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: 測試指定的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> 是否存在。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> exists; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 存在則為 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a method, named `CreateQueue`, that initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> object by calling the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.GetService%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範名為 `CreateQueue` 的方法，此方法透過呼叫 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> 方法來初始化 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.GetService%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The code then uses the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.Exists%2A> method to determine if a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> with a specified name exists.
trans-unit.target: 然後，此程式碼會使用 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.Exists%2A> 方法來判斷具有指定名稱的 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> 是否存在。

trans-unit.source: If it does not exist, the code calls the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.CreateWorkflowQueue%2A> method; if it does the code calls the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.GetWorkflowQueue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果不存在，程式碼會呼叫 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.CreateWorkflowQueue%2A> 方法，否則呼叫 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.GetWorkflowQueue%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取之 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: 擷取指定的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a method, named `CreateQueue`, that initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> object by calling the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.GetService%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範名為 `CreateQueue` 的方法，此方法透過呼叫 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> 方法來初始化 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.GetService%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The code then uses the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.Exists%2A> method to determine if a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> with a specified name exists.
trans-unit.target: 然後，此程式碼會使用 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.Exists%2A> 方法來判斷具有指定名稱的 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> 是否存在。

trans-unit.source: If it does not exist, the code calls the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.CreateWorkflowQueue%2A> method; if it does the code calls the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.GetWorkflowQueue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果不存在，程式碼會呼叫 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.CreateWorkflowQueue%2A> 方法，否則呼叫 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.GetWorkflowQueue%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the File Watcher Activity SDK Sample from the FileSystemEvent.cs file.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是 FileSystemEvent.cs 檔案中＜檔案監看員活動 SDK＞範例的一部分。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [File System Watcher Activity](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5442b63a-bdad-43d0-b7cf-f0b5d8b56a99).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[檔案系統監看員活動](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5442b63a-bdad-43d0-b7cf-f0b5d8b56a99)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="queueName" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="queueName" /> 為 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)。

trans-unit.source: The specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> was not found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到指定的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" />。

trans-unit.source: Contains the unconsumed items in the workflow queues associated with this <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含與此 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService" /> 關聯之工作流程佇列中的未使用項目。

trans-unit.source: When a workflow instance completes or terminates all of the unconsumed items in its workflow queues that are associated with this <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> are moved to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.PendingMessagesProperty>.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程執行個體完成或終止時，在其與此 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> 關聯的工作流程佇列中的所有未使用項目會移至 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.PendingMessagesProperty>。
